heading: Shipment and delivery certification of materials listed, labeled or approved
text:
In the case of the shipment or
   delivery of material listed or labeled to a standard, such material shall be appropriately labeled or accompanied by the insp ection
   certificate of an approved agency that the material is the same as that which was tested and evaluated by such agency. In the case
   of the shipment or delivery of material previously approved by the commissioner, the material shall be identified by a tag or
   certificate indicating that the material is the same that was approved for its intended use by the commissioner or, if applic able,
   previously approved by the board of standards and appeals, and containing the applicable approval number or calendar number
   under which the material received such approval.
